page.title: 19Children's Leisure,Montrose.
page.content: In the{Borrowfield Area}of Montrose,primary school children can attend a{Youth Club}held every Thursday in the school which is run by interested parents. Some boys go to {Cubs and Scouts}while girls go to {Brownies and Guides.}Recently an {athletics}club has started in town which attracts many youngsters while the{swimming}pool continues to be popular and the SEALS club is well supported.{Mini rugby}is also available for boys.{BMX}cycling is a new pastime and a special track has been constucted at Broomfield. In the evenings,{discos}are enjoyed and {football}continues to be played on any spare ground.{Home computers}have captured the interests of many as a hobby and watching{television}and {videos}would probably be the commonest pastime among children between 5 - 12.
